{"id":397887930,"lang":"cpp","time":"10 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1600529663,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/397887930/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"#include <vector>\n#include <string>\nusing namespace std;\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int myAtoi(string str) {\n\t\tstd::vector<char> vecChars;\n\t\tlong long int sum = 0 ;\n\t\tlong long int maxi = 2147483648 -1;\n\t\tlong long int mini = -2147483648 ;\n\t\tbool isNegative = false;\n\n\n\t\tchar upper = '9';\n\t\tchar lower = '0';\n\t\tbool isFirst = true;\n\n\n\t\tfor (auto ch : str){\n\t\t\tif (isFirst && ch == '-'){\n                isNegative = true;\n                isFirst = false;\n            }\n                \n            else if (isFirst && ch == '+'){\n\t\t\t\tisNegative = false;\n\t\t\t\tisFirst = false;\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\telse if (isFirst && ch == ' '){\n\t\t\t\tcontinue;\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\telse if (ch <= upper && lower <= ch){\n\t\t\t\tsum *= 10;\n\t\t\t\tsum += ch - '0';\n\t\t\t\tisFirst = false;\n\n                if (isNegative)\n                {\n                    if (sum > maxi+1)\n                        return int(mini);\n                }\n                else {\n                    if (sum > maxi)\n                        return int(maxi);\n                }\n\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\telse {\n\t\t\t\tif (isFirst)\n\t\t\t\t\treturn 0;\n                else {\n                    break;\n                }\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t}\n\t\tif (isNegative)\n\t\t{\n\t\t\tif (sum > maxi+1)\n\t\t\t\treturn int(mini);\n\t\t\tsum *= -1;\n\t\t}\n\t\telse {\n\t\t\tif (sum > maxi)\n\t\t\t\treturn int(maxi);\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn int(sum);\n\n        \n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi"}
